item.title: FilterProducts
item.description: FilterProducts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to the Catalog > Products" page" Products listing is displayed correctly Reset all filters All filters are reset. All products are displayed Save the numbers of products in a variable Number of products is saved Filter the list by name. Criteria : Customizable mug" Products list is filtered. Products listed have Customizable mug" in their name" Reset all filters All filters are reset.
